lead_paragraph: FURLONG--Mary A.,of Westbury, NY (formerly of Garden City, NY and Wellesley, South Natick and Duxbury, MA). July 15, 2016. 86 years old. Beloved wife of Padric F.X. Furlong (deceased) and loving mother of Brenda Furlong of Cortland, NY, Padraic and Mary Furlong of Port Washington, NY, Myles and Jann Furlong of Falmouth, MA, Edmond and Carolyn Furlong of Needham, MA and Matthew and Maria Furlong of Needham, MA. Loving grandmother and great-grandmother. Raised on a farm in Rhode Island, Mary moved to New York City to work at Abraham and Strauss in Brooklyn, where she found Pat and over the next fifty years they created a life together. She was tirelessly devoted to her family and guided us with gentle warmth. Industrious, optimistic and humble, she made us laugh with her wry humor. She faced adversity with uncompromising perseverance. We thank her for being a model of how to live with grace and dignity. Visiting hours Tuesday, July 19, 7-9pm at Donohue Cecere, 290 Post Avenue, Westbury, NY. Services Wednesday, July 20, 9:45am, St. Brigid's Church, 75 Post Avenue, Westbury, NY. 1/3
